backend/main.mo: Actor manages user profiles, Dropbox token storage, authorization, and PDF retrieval with access control but no backend PDF upload implementation.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related source files, components, and requirement IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of major frontend files used in the project.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styling defining light/dark theme tokens and base UI variables.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document that mounts the React application and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app router and layout setup with profile initialization, theming, and page routing.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: UI card that displays an access denied message with navigation back to home.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting authenticated users to enter and save their profile name.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAdmi: Route guard that checks admin status and shows loading or access denied screens.
frontend/src/components/checklist/Checkl: Layout wrapper for checklist form sections with title, description, and content area.
frontend/src/components/checklist/YesNoF: Reusable Yes/No radio field component for checklist boolean inputs.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer showing copyright, branding, and Caffeine.ai link with tracking.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Header component with navigation, login/logout handling, and admin access button based on authentication and admin status.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context including login, logout, status tracking, and identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for user profile, roles, admin status, and Dropbox token using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes and global layout settings.
frontend/src/lib/checklist/defaults.ts: Returns the default structure and initial values for a checklist form.
frontend/src/lib/checklist/types.ts: Type definitions describing the full structure of the checklist form data.
frontend/src/lib/pdf/downloadPdf.ts: Creates a blob from PDF bytes and triggers a download in the browser.
frontend/src/lib/pdf/filename.ts: Sanitizes a room number into a safe PDF filename.
frontend/src/lib/pdf/generateChecklistPd: Generates a simple text-based PDF from checklist data using a minimal custom PDF builder.
frontend/src/lib/upload/uploadChecklistP: Uploads a checklist PDF to Dropbox but relies on an unimplemented backend token fetch.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/AdminSettingsPage.tsx: Admin settings page UI for viewing, entering, and saving a Dropbox access token, with status indicators and secure input handling.
frontend/src/pages/ChecklistFormPage.tsx: Form page that captures checklist data, generates and downloads a PDF, and optionally uploads it to Dropbox using a stored token.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-stored values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, typography, animations, and container settings.
project_state.json: Project state file describing the appâ€™s goals, implemented features, and pending feature requests.
